name: Paul_(Las_Vegas)
text:
Paul (Las Vegas)
"Roll the dice, Sheena!"
Paul was a news anchorman at the Las Vegas-based news station KQRY.
On one evening broadcast in late September 2016, Paul and his co-anchor Sheena reported on the attempted shooting of local insurance salesman Dougie Jones and the arrest of his attacker, Ike "The Spike" Stadtler.
